name: R5-M2 (Arfive-Emmtoo) (V)
Lore: 'Programmed to pilot sublight tactical courses. R5 units are in high demand for combat starships. R5-M2 helped plan evacuation routes from Echo Base. Owned by Shawn Valdez.',
Text: 'Your capital starships are deploy -1 and are destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny. Once per game, Shawn Valdez may deploy for free to same site.',
